text: Jerry Markbreit (born March 23, 1935) is a former American football referee in the National Football League (NFL) for 23 seasons. He became one of the best known referees in the game. Markbreit officiated football games for 43 seasons. From 1965 to 1975, Markbreit officiated college football games in the Big Ten Conference. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Jerry Markbreit
